body.name: Brightever LED Outdoor String Lights 100FT Patio Lights with 52 Shatterproof ST38 Vintage Edison Bulbs, Outside Hanging Lights Waterproof for Porch, Deck, Garden, Backyard, Balcony, 2700K Dimmable
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 21 hrs 2 mins
features: 【Higher Quality and Lower Costs】- 100ft Extra-long outdoor string lights are equipped with our upgrade heavy-duty wires and 52 shatterproof edison bulbs, which can be connected up to 15 strands easily. You could place them in a larger area without worrying about the length and frequent replacement. Over a 30,000-hour longer lifespan, our energy-saving string lights will not only provide brighter lighting but also cut down 90% of your electricity bills compared with incandescent ones.

【Weatherproof and Safer】- With our weatherproof technology, these durable outside string lights can withstand rain, wind, snow, and extreme temperatures up to 158 degrees Fahrenheit for you to leave them outside year-round confidently. Furthermore, the bulb shells are made of hard anti-drop plastic, protect you and your family while hanging the waterproof backyard string lights, no more worries about the suddenly broken glass shards.

【Classic Bistro Ambience】- These vintage string lights come with st38 tear-drop E12 bulbs which could provide a nice, soft yellow glow without being too bright or too dark. Besides, these led bulbs not only offer old-fashioned appearance, but also compatible with most dimmers (not included) to achieve better lighting flexibility. It will be a great choice for creating your little outdoor paradise, where you could enjoy your time after a busy day or have a cozy party with your friends.

【Super Convenient and Widely used】 - It's a breeze to hang these led string lights with built-in hooks or zip ties. We even improved the hooks, sockets, and cords for you to use our string lights without facing the sudden breaking situation. These easy-to-use party outdoor string lights are fabulous decorations for your garden, Bistro, balcony, terrace, pergola, gazebo, tent, pool umbrella, cafe, bedroom, living room, market, wedding, birthday, Christmas party or other scenarios.

【You Have Brightever's Words】- We proudly stand behind all of our products 100% and care every feedback of you. The satisfaction of our consumers with each purchase has always been and will always remain our top concern.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Light up Your Area with 100ft LED Shatterproof ST38 String Lights -Are you looking for energy-saving outdoor string lights to decorate your beautiful place? -Are you tired of changing the cheap quality patio string lights that stop working only after a few days? -Do you feel annoyed when the bulbs were broken and pieces fell out everywhere? How frustrating! That’s why we bring out these super durable outdoor string lights for all-year-round use.

Elegant Romantic Ambience Lighting These dimmable cafe string lights could give off comfortable and welcoming warm glow. Hanging them in your place, you can invite your friends to come for watching an outdoor movie or hold a summer family reunion party. With our stunning string lights, you could create some unforgettable memories to your life. Awesome backyard lights Get our bistro outdoor string lights in your backyard, to make it into a fantastic vacation spot. You could either hang them zigzag like the carnival market lights or wrap them on your plants adding a glamping atmosphere. What a wonderful place to chill up with the lovely people around you under these sparking string lights. Perfect for Indoor and Outdoor Use After numberless tests, we produced these unbreakable string lights with great materials and technology to make sure they can work well with heavy rain, snow, strong wind, and extreme temperatures. You could use them in different regions of the country like Northeast, Southwest, West, Southeast, and Midwest. No matter where you hang them, they will stay cool and safe for your family to touch.

Bulbs Specifications Type: ST38 led bulbs with E12 base Quantity: 50+2 spare Dimension: 1.57 inch Height: 3.54 inch Lifespan: 30000 hours Plug Type: 2-prong plug Lighting Color: 2700K warm white Before packing, every bulb was checked and tested numerous times. Package includes 100ft String light x 1 ST38 Edison Bulbs x 52 User Manual x 1

Carefully Selected Shatterproof Bulbs We discovered that lots of customers are troubled by the fragile stereotyped G40 outdoor string lights. To offer high-quality outdoor string lights and thoughtful customer shopping experience, we finally choose these anti-fall st38 led light bulbs fitted with both higher transmittance shells and lower energy costs after many comparisons and tests. We are committed to helping you away from shattered, short lasted bulb problems. Money-Worth Commercial Grade Cords Many customers who bought other decorative string lights said they are exhausted by replacing poor-quality string lights. Our enhanced durable wires could stand up to various weathers and climates without any worries. Whether you use them at home or in the bistro, shopping mall, and other commercial places, these well-made outside led lights will not disappoint you at all. Upgrade Link up 15 strands Differ from other porch string lights which can only connect 10 strands, our extra-long outdoor string lights are connectable up to 15 strands without any danger. If you need to decorate a larger place, we are the great choice. The length and amount you get are awesome, can cover most of your planned areas. More importantly, there is one fuse hidden in the plug in case of your need. Thoughtful Length Design We changed our design countless times to achieve the most proper distance between the male plug to the first bulb. The final answer is 9.8ft. It can save your time and money on looking for an extra extension socket online or in the store. Moreover, all bulbs are set apart 1.8ft long for giving off great brightness.

Warm tips: 1. Each of our hanging outdoor string lights will be wrapped well before leaving the factory. You just need to hold the middle part of these string lights with one hand and straighten the strings out with the other hand. (starting from the plug) 2. Please tighten all connecting parts to ensure a proper operation. If single or a few light bulbs do not work, it's probably caused by disconnection between the small copper inside the socket and the light bulb base. In this case, you can use a stick or other tools to bring the copper out a little so it can reconnect with light bulb base.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brightever 100FT LED Outdoor String Lights Review: Illuminating the Night with Elegance
reviews.reviewText: When you need to transform a space and create a warm, inviting atmosphere, the right lighting can work wonders. That's precisely what the Brightever LED Outdoor String Lights did for us when we needed to light up a 20x40 canopy, making it a cozy and welcoming haven under the stars.We used five sets of these fantastic string lights to get the job done, and the result was nothing short of spectacular. The 52 Shatterproof ST38 Vintage Edison Bulbs emitted a warm 2700K glow that set the perfect mood for our outdoor gathering. The dimmable feature allowed us to adjust the brightness to our liking, ensuring that we had the right ambiance for any occasion.One of the most impressive aspects of these lights is their versatility. We were able to place them anywhere we desired, even in areas where power outlets were not accessible. This was a game-changer, allowing us to create an enchanting space in our canopy tent, without any limitations.To maximize their use, we found a clever solution. We used towels to cover the solar sensor during the evening transition, making it think it was darker than it really was. Once the night sky enveloped us, we could remove the towels, and the lights shone beautifully, enhancing the ambiance.In conclusion, the Brightever 100FT LED Outdoor String Lights are an absolute must-have for anyone looking to illuminate their outdoor spaces with elegance and charm. These lights are not only waterproof but also highly durable, making them perfect for a variety of settings. Whether you're hosting a gathering, a romantic dinner, or simply want to enjoy your outdoor space in the evening, these lights have got you covered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These went around our back porch ceiling. The worst part was untangling them. It wasn't horrible, but was a little work. (purchased 100 ft version) Putting them up was easy. They are beautiful and functional. The light is not too bright nor too dim. I would definitely purchase these again. They didn't come with a remote; we purchased one separately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Arrived well packaged, they look fantastic.
reviews.reviewText: Product is nice, well laid out, as designed. Installed under a carport, so not in the weather, and had six bulbs fail within two weeks of installation. Will try adjusting the socket contacts, will update.**UpDate** Customer service is absolutely fantastic. Bulbs were faulty, and they worked with me to handle situation. Very happy, as they illuminate perfectly and am pleased with the quality of the lights overall. As a note to installation, we used a hanging kit, one with the coated wire, tensioners and zip ties along with anchor hooks to hang these. In addition, I placed a very small dot of dialectic grease (sometimes called ‘bulb grease’ in auto repair) on the tip of the bulbs I replaced to aid in weather resistance. Florida is humid, and it rains a bit - so I attribute that to the issue I ran into. As mentioned, supplier worked with me and I am thrilled with outcome. Everything works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Can't be beat for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I love the price, the durability and the energy efficiency of the bulbs. I'm still amazed that you can get all the light from only 1 watt! They are very bright. You may need a dimmer. I ordered one because they were just too bright. I would rather they be too bright than too dim. Highly recommended. Comes with two extra bulbs to boot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bright, durable mini-bulbs!
reviews.reviewText: Ordered 2 100-foot strands, as we wanted to add illumination to both our upper deck and the patio space beneath it. The bulbs are plastic, LED in the "old time filament bulb" appearance, but only about 2-½" long and with candelabra bases - bright! Unwinding them and getting everything laid out for mounting is, frankly, a headache as the everything constantly re-tangles, partly because the wiring itself is rather stiff. Having handled them extensively during the unpacking and getting them strung, I'd say they're of a pretty durable construction. Now that they're up, they're beautiful at night and add useful illumination.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy Install, and these guys are BRIGHT!
reviews.reviewText: So please with the purchase of these stringer lights! 150 feet of pure beauty. I use a separate dimmer unit and these babies are perfect for my patio. Each bulb is replaceable as well. At any length, this is a great light set!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: One of the better lights that we have used. Strings did not get tangled as they were being installed. Looks great and tight on the house. Did not fill with water during the rain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These lights are durable and nice looking. They've been out in the (constant) rain for about 3 weeks now and are unaffected. They're just the right brightness. We use them to line the 100 ft (or so) walk between the house and chicken coop, it's to do an after-dark check on them.

Half the lights were not working once they were set up and all are gone within two weeks. Do not know if one can get replacement bulbs of the same size and specs. Absolute waste of money and material.
